questions.question: This arc features the Straw Hat Pirates' separation and subsequent two-year hiatus, as well as the introduction of the Eleven Supernovas. What is...?
Taking place on an island on the back of an elephant, this arc delves into the history of the Mink Tribe and the Kozuki Family. What is...?
This arc is where Luffy first demonstrates Gear Second and Gear Third while battling against CP9. What is...?
This advanced form of Armament Haki allows the user to emit their Haki beyond their body to attack the inside of an object. What is...?
This ability allows its user to swim through the ground as if it were water, used notably by a member of the Shichibukai. What is...?
This technique allows its user to multiply their limbs and heads, as seen used by a certain Marine officer. What is...?
This character, a former member of the Roger Pirates and known for his light-light fruit powers, played a significant role in the Void Century. Who is...?
This character, known as 'The Surgeon of Death', is the captain of the Heart Pirates and possesses the Ope Ope no Mi. Who is...?
This character, known for their love of sweets and terrifying ability to manipulate souls, rules over Whole Cake Island. Who is...?
